item.title: Presentations
item.description: 4 ways to Dockerize Apache bigdata project (Docker meetup, Budapest) From docker to Kubernetes: Running Hadoop in a cloud-natie way (Berlin Buzzwords 2018) Apache Hadoop Ozone in the cloud-native word: Use Hadoop as a Kubernetes persistent storage provider (Apache Roadshow EU, 2018)
